Question: Chengdu Huitong West-electronic Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Chengdu Huitong West-electronic Co.,Ltd

Product: CES 2024

- Specializes in piezoelectric ceramics and ultrasonic sensors
- Offers highly reliable and economical ultrasonic sensors for various applications
- Provides complete solutions including ultrasonic transducers/sensors and customization
- Complies with EU RoHs and Reach environmental protection requirements
- Products used in automotive applications, cleaning appliances, robots, home appliances, office equipment, 3D printing equipment, semiconductor equipment, the Internet of Things, and medical treatment
- Has more than 50 years of production experience
- Owns own brand (HTW) and intellectual property rights
- Recognized as a National High Tech Enterprise and National "little giant" firm
- Maintains IATF16949 certification and has advanced technology and equipment

For more information, visit Chengdu Huitong West-electronic Co.,Ltd at CES 2024.
Summary_cn:
成都汇通西电子有限公司

产品：CES 2024

- 专业生产压电陶瓷和超声波传感器
- 提供可靠、经济的超声波传感器，适用于各种应用
- 提供包括超声波换能器/传感器和定制等完整解决方案
- 符合欧盟RoHs和Reach环保要求
- 产品应用于汽车应用、清洁电器、机器人、家用电器、办公设备、3D打印设备、半导体设备、物联网和医疗领域
- 具有50多年的生产经验
- 拥有自有品牌（HTW）和知识产权
- 被认定为国家高新技术企业和国家“小巨人”企业
- 保持IATF16949认证，具备先进技术和设备

欲了解更多信息，请访问成都汇通西电子有限公司在CES 2024展位。
